name: Jonathan Medlin
text: I was very impressed with the service. Quick, and delicious. We really appreciate the curbside option. Carly provided excellent customer service.

name: D Maxey
text: Great service friendly people Top quality ingredients make killer pizza

name: Eric Gainer
text: Customer service changes everything. My family eats here often, and the service is good. Tonight though, there were a few problems with the food. The waitress and manager were both engaged, and more than made up for the error. There was no ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle Hilmes
text: I ordered pretzels and they were hard, dry and unedible and when I asked the waitress of they are usually that hard she rolled her eyes and walked away. I also ordered hot wings and when I got them the wings were not tossed in the sauce but they poured the sauce on the plate. Not happy at all with this visit!

name: janet taylor
text: For safety, I'm only comfortable with outdoor, patio seating at restaurants. This was perfect. All staff were masked. Seating was spaced. Our servers were congenial. The food (chef salad) was excellent. Planning to return.

name: Jenni Ferreira
text: This is our favorite spot to go out for pizza! We come here about once a month and order the same thing each time and we typically come for late lunch or early dinner. The pizza is always consistent and excellent and we also like the salted ‚Ä¶More

name: Lorraine Finch
text: The best pizza I've had in a long time. I'm from NY so that says a lot! Highly recommend Mellow Mushroomüëç

name: Terri Moore
text: A 15-20 pizza took 35+ and I had to call them again to remind them I hadn't received my pizza yet and was still waiting in parking lot.  Then it was brought out.  Cold and barely enough chicken on it to call it a chicken pizza.  My first ‚Ä¶More

name: Sarah Johnson
text: Really good food, staff was very hip and friendly. My kids loved the giant mushroom in the center of the restaurant.

name: Gramdalf
text: Food and atmosphere is top notch if great Pizza is what your after.

name: Vantona Wright
text: Drove by the downtown location for years. Finally visited the Wake Forest location last night. It was great! The service was on point as our server was friendly and prompt. The food was delicious. I had the avocado hoagie. My children had a ‚Ä¶More

name: danny shattuck
text: It would have been nice to get a drink, but the bar was full because of some "Dad" was getting plastered infront of his son. Pizza and staff great! Thank you for being for being open.

name: Treva Powers
text: Our large pizza was served cold tues Sept 22. Our special treat going out for pizza and was cold. It was not the pizza maker. It was ther server who was not very good. Did not serve pizza while warm. First time since we have been going to ‚Ä¶More

name: Julie McDonough
text: Steak and cheese was cooked perfectly. Service not too good. Had to ask for 3 missing things

name: Jason D. Hicks
text: Great pizza and drinks, wonderful place for an evening dinner with friends, family or the misses.

name: Nell Keith
text: Not real thrilled with the food it was alright but nothing like the one in Durham.

name: Kelli Kinane
text: We had a 100% vegan baby shower for my sister in January and hired the Wake Forest Mellow Mushroom to cater. Katie, the catering manager, made the process easy & smooth. She took great care to make sure we had exactly what we wanted, ‚Ä¶More

name: Rick Bardos
text: Pizza is always cooked perfectly and the staff makes sure that you have a pleasant experience.

name: Kelly Jones
text: We have two celiac family members who have done very well here. Food is delicious and fresh too.

name: Omar Oropesa
text: Great place for the family. Freshly baked pizzas, great dough, great creative combination of flavors and great customer service. Something new in the pizza industry at a moderate price. I strongly recommend.

name: Dora Pearce
text: Nice covered outdoor patio. Friendly staff. Scrumptious chicken salad sandwich.

name: Cory Ford
text: The atmosphere is the perfect, the food is great the variety of the pizzas are wonderful, and the wing are the best especially the Tia Chili. The BBq winds are good could use a little more flavor.

name: Karen Degraw
text: Fantastic pizza~unique flavors and delicious appetizers! Great hospitality and definitely recommend!

name: edouard littrell
text: One of the best pizzas I've had in the area.

name: Gloria Deans
text: Very good pizza and awesome service.

name: Daniel Cortes
text: Very nice service from all the staff, hope they keep it up always

name: Robb Mysiewicz
text: Service was good, pizza was great, and everyone kept their social distance!

name: Michelle Waldman
text: How can you go wrong with Pizza and.Salad??.. You can't. I've been to the Mellow Mushroom in Delray Beach, FL and this one . Everytime consistent good quality good and good staff.

name: Aubrey
text: Always get the cessation salad. Always awesome! My babies love their kid pizza!

name: Bernice Brooks
text: Lunch Buffet was good, Enlightened Spinach Salad was Awesome. Garlic Bread And Spinach Dip great and friendly service.

name: John Mohr
text: The staff was amazing and the food was good.  Every thing went well until an incident occurred.  This is where management stepped in and again was amazing.  Would be 5 star if not for the incident.  Review will be updated after future visits.

name: Ajeta Glenn
text: The pizza was hot and fresh, but wings were more fatty than just being a regular wings. We have Graduation gathering and our server was not attentive

name: Heather Smith
text: Great family atmosphere and the music is on point! Awesome selections for dietary needs like gluten free, vegan, and vegetarian. I was able to try tofu on my pizza!

name: nikkiNicole outlaw
text:
asian chillin wings here are some of the best wings I ever tasted!
Them, a Veg-Out pizza and a "enlightened " salad are my go to.
LOVE M.M.

name: Rita GomiIIion
text: Dinner was outstanding and the pizzas were delisoius. Our server Jessica was awesome! I would definitely visit her again. It was nice to have such a helpful and sweet server to help with our gluten free needs.

name: Stephanie Grant
text: I had a very bad experience using  Grubhub  when having a pizza delivered through them. When I spoke to the managers  Coleen and Kate they were both apologetic and made my family two more hot fresh pizzas and delivered them to us. Now ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Hilton
text: Always great. Gluten free pizza is awesome and always very careful. Kids love the place too, so good for everyone.

name: Evelyn Moses
text: Great food! Clean dining room. Helpful servers!

name: Jeffrey Drew
text: Always great food and service!

name: Clara Hazzard
text: My husband and I just got take out from here and it was horrible. The pizza was thrown together with globs of uncooked veggies on top not even cut up correctly. Huge chucks of raw onion and green peppers. We tried to remedy it by ‚Ä¶More

text: My grandson brought me here for dinner. How cool the atmosphere is. Staff is upbeat, lively and proficient. Food was excellent. Highly recommend the italian hogie on pita bread. They have pizza, sandwhiches, deserts, big cookies,full bar, ‚Ä¶More

name: Suraj Oomman
text: Love the very many options they have to the specialty pies. Also love the wings!

name: Megan Watson
text: Great atmosphere, food, and service as always!

name: Kelly Carraway Realtor Century 21 Triangle Group
text: Great service and pizza always!

name: brian carlson
text: Food is good. I really enjoy the crust. However, when we'r went to this establishment the service was sub-par. Everything vame out timely and correct, but our server rarely visited the table, did not do refills very well, and was just not doing a great job. We were one of three tables seated at the time.

name: Steve Smith
text: Great pizza and an even better calzone.  Both very reasonably priced.  The atmosphere is bright and fun and the staff upbeat and friendly.  Parking is a challenge though .

name: Winston Thomas
text: Hard for me to rate a place that primarily does pizza since I'm from New York I'll just say that the decor is nice and if you enjoy hippy-dippy stuff then this place is for you. The food seems a bit pricey for what it is.

name: Jocelyn Toledo
text: The food here is wonderful. There's a variety of food options, not just pizza. And of course if it's the pizza you came for .. you'll love it. The crust is just perfect and much better pizza than other options. The service here is fantastic and is worth a visit if you're looking for a different pizza place. You won't be disappointed!

name: Joe Amor
text: Decent service and great food! Gourmet pizza and delicious pretzels and salads

name: John Bittle
text: Pacific Rim and meaty pizza were great.  The cheese steak was very tasty.

name: Chris Napoli
text: Totally Rad pizza, man. Awesome pretzels and beer cheese dip

name: David Dobbs
text: Great atmosphere! Friendly staff, and the food is amazing! If you haven't, then you should!!!

name: Stevie Blomquist
text: Great food, great service

text: Ok pizza with sub par service.

name: Shannon Roy
text: Tried this place years ago and hated it but thought I'd give it another try. Ordered a large pizza and wings..the wings weren't bad but the pizza was....COLD, chewy and tough. The cheese was dried like it had been left out over night. For the price I'm pretty disappointed. Never again.

name: Ryan Richardson
text: Great service and bomb vegan pizza!

name: cookie queen
text: Me and my family had dinner here, and a waiter named Allison served us. Allison saw that my mom didn‚Äôt like the sandwich, and she took the meal off our check. Food was delicious, I recommend this place and the waiter. Keep up he good work!

text: We were looking for somewhere to eat and we were starving. We came across this restaurant and were pleasantly surprised by the quick service, good food, and fun decor. ‚Ä¶More

name: Peggy Schoonover

name: Frugalnista

text: I love that they have vegan options which doesn't  include just removing cheese from a pizza. They have vegan cheese but they also have tofu and tempeh for sandwiches and toppings as well.

text: Nice restaurant but nothing special about their pizza. Their pizza reminded me of Papa John's, but much more expensive.

name: David Bawcum

name: Tiffany R
text: I have NEVER been disappointed in the food or service here. The staff is always pleasant, knowledgeable and fast. The Holy Shitake pizza and spinach salad are incredible. text: The key to their pizzas is the crust! It's complex flavor, chewy middle and crusty New York style crunch is awesome. I never remember to take a photo before I dive in!

name: Rob Morris
text: Great tasting pizza with very casual service.  Great place for families and or groups as they ate very accommodating.  Even after leaving, they demonstrated their commitment to the customer experience by reaching out to me; so yes, you earned your 5th star!

text: I can't begin to describe how delicious every single thing we ordered was. The bruschetta disappeared very quickly. The pizzas were incredible and the staff was very friendly

name: Adam Edsall

text: Pricey.  Never offer specials.   The lunch buffet was awful... out of pizza at noon... had to wait.   Salad was not fresh

text: The food is good but I have to make a report about the straws, and the sticky table along with the wet floor.The straws get very wet because they‚Äôre like paper and they rip.

text: Great family restaurant.  My kids love sitting under the giant mushroom in the middle of the restaurant.  They have a good local beer selection and the food is delicious.  Try the pretzel bites with beer cheese.

name: C W
text: Love Mellow Mushroom! I try to check one out in every city that I travel too. Staff was great.

name: Chad Johnson
text: We did come in on a Friday night, so I expected them to be busy.  I did not expect, however, to wait close to an hour and fifteen minutes after we were seated for our food to arrive.  The food was at least up to their normal standard once ‚Ä¶More

text: Great pizza

text: Good buffet, limited options for non pork eaters, the calzones were really big and cheesy, overall good place

name: m z
text: I will not be going back here. The pizza is very expensive and I found hair in my pizza.

name: Roy Harwell
text: Did not know there is a lunch buffet.  It was popular.  I had the jerk chicken hoagie for the first time, and it was the perfect blend of hot and sweet.  Wait staff was attentive, kept the drinks full and asked often if we needed anything. ‚Ä¶More

name: Christina Fulcher

name: Michael Andrews

name: Tommy Lowery
text: Great place to eat and drink. Great service. Sarah the waitress is the bessssssstttttüòçüòç

name: John Truluck
text: Shared a pizza with a friend. She is vegan, so I tried their Veg Out with vegan cheese. Absolutely amazing. Wonderful corn dusted crust with an incredible bite. Also, had a salad with the most fabulous balsamic vinaigrette. Would highly recommend this place!

name: Roneisha Ward
text: My fresh sangria was the absolute best!!! The manager hands down is the best!!! My friend and I will definitely be back!

name: Nick Chehreh
text: Good food and great service

name: Julia Moore
text: The pizza was the best we've had since we moved to North Carolina. The ingredients were good and didn't taste processed.

name: mamat toing
text: Definitely worth the drive to go to the one on peace street. The food at this location tastes off. Dough is different tasting and so is the wing sauce. It‚Äôs not bad, but definitely LESS than what was expected.

name: Anda Fox
text: We have always loved the food this Mellow, it is especially great for team meals after games.     I just heard they were offering an all you can eat lunch buffet and it did not disappoint!!    The salad bar has plenty of options and a nice variety of pizzas.    Will definitely be back!

name: Chris Shearer
text: Love us some mellow mushroom pizza.  The only thing I can say I don't like are their prices.  Two small gluten free and a large were $60.  A bit much, but our Celiac girls love the gluten free and I love the kosmic karma.  We usually get it to go and it is usually right on time.

name: Ruth Hines
text: Delicious food. This location will let you order off menu items like the mowie wowie!!!! Yum!

name: Luke Williams
text: Best "chain" pizza in the area. Consistently good pie, especially if you dig funky flavors. GF options. Friendly service. There are better NY or Chi style pizzas nearby but this is a good place for variety and a good option to take kids (small 10" pizzas).

name: Joan McManus
text: The pizza lunch  buffet is awesome with all you can eat fresh salad and five ever-changing varieties of pizza.  The service is good and the price can't be beat.  I'd truly be in heaven if all this could happen on a low-fat basis!

name: Coach Cotto
text: Ordered online. Came in to pick it up and was ignored by 2 employees (1foot in front of me, and couldn't even greet me). Sat in the lobby for 15 minutes while my pizza got cold. I will not be ordering from this location again.

name: Daniel Hawkins
text: Jillian is amazing, go see her at the bar

name: Ryan Griffin
text:
Trivia night music is shrill beyond belief.  Do not go on Thursdays!!!

Food is great, just like any other Mellow Mushroom.

name: sharon Jones
text: Very good food.Miss the lunch sub combo

name: Seriana Gamble
text: Food wasn't that great especially for the price, but the server was very nice and more than accommodating.

name: Steve Hill

name: Sammie Davenport
text: enjoyed it! Good food and good service!

name: Kristen Newman
text: Best pizza and beer cheese

name: Eddie Dixon
text: My wife cannot do cow dairy and they have a vegan cheese that she is able to eat. She loves pizza but can never eat it. Now she can. Also the dinner salad I got was beyond my expectations and our waitress was very nice and did her job well. Definitely going back.

name: Shaun Robinson
text: My whole family likes the atmosphere and especially like the pizza. Their is even a balloon maker (Paul) who walks around and creates great surprises. Love the crust and the gluten free option for my wife.

name: Gary Lee
text: Food and service is always good in WF. Love coming here for pizza.

name: Queyanna Gamble
text: The food was not good at this restaurant..The vegetarian calzone was nasty and tasteless and the marinara sauce tasted like paste. The stuffed portabella mushroom was also tasteless....the pizza was not great for the cost....the customer service was great along with the chocolate brownie....so order dessert first...lol

name: D Tuck
text: MM is consistently good no matter which location you go to.  A little something for everyone with not a lot of wait time.

name: Louis Valentino

name: Daniel Owns
text: Food tastes different and not as good as the peace street location. Ate here for first time and was definitely disappointed ‚Ä¶More

name: Lauren Myers
text: Very good pizza and awesome service! Didn't feel rushed to hurry and eat and go even though it was close to closing time (sorry!).will be going back again!

name: Chris Taybron
text: Friendly staff and good food.

name: Cheri Allen
text: I had the meatballs. It's an appetizer so it's a small portion of three with mozzarella and marinara sauce. The staff is friendly, the pizza tastes great. They have gluten free options. Great atmosphere with outdoor seating.

name: James Martin
text: Highly recommend. I initially had a discrepancy with my order, and Hannah stepped right in and helped out wonderfully. They clearly care about their food and the customer experience.

name: Judy Perry
text: Long wait but we had a lot of food. Great tasting food. Will be back.

name: Charles Sasser
text: Come here often when getting car serviced.  I have never seen a wait for lunch during the week. Fresh food and excellent service.  Tried the lunch buffet today for the first time.  It surpassed  my expectations. Don't forget the Frio pops for a refreshing  way to have dessert. Highly recommended.

name: Joseph Spilotras
text: Great place for pizza and chill

name: krista behrendt
text: First time at mellow mushroom and our server Emily exceeded our expectations... so knowledgeable and was very attentive to my gluten allergy because unfortunately I was born celiac.... an auto-immunes disease that does not aloud you to consume gluten...thank you again Emily for a wonderful experience... we will be back!

name: Kate Hurd

name: Brenda Bowden

text: The veggie pizza was amazing !!! And our server...SUPEERRRR nice and beautiful. As well as the one in Georgia. Great great great ! Thank you guys . Our food came out fast, the drink a plus. And the whole staff was REALLY nice. Hard to find good food with good hospitality. But this place was AMAZING!!

name: Julie Jacomet
text: Very pleasant and helpful employees. We were visiting from Indiana and decided we wanted pizza. Not knowing the area we knew nothing about this place it was a good choice.

name: Russ
text: I placed an order on the phone for a medium half and half pizza. When I came to pick up my pizza, I realized that half of the pizza was incorrect. They apologized immediately and offered to make me a small pizza of the right kind on the spot.

name: Doug Blanchard
text: Great place for our basketball team's end of season party.  Tasty food with a great server.

name: Wes Meyers
text: Nice atmosphere, it's clean, and has friendly staff. Pizza isn't anything special. I've had frozen pizza that's just as good.

name: David Bowman
text: You can get anything you want, at Alice's Restaurant üé∂üé∂ Love the mellow üçÑüëå Have a wonderful end of the year. My favorite MM outside of Boone, and definitely above Marilyn Manson in my books.

text: Great food and atmosphere.  I would suggest their Stromboli, i think its better than a pizza and 2 people can share it.  Their staff is always nice and attentive.  Hard to beat if you want a great place that keeps the whole family entertained with TVs and great food.

text: Pizza, salads, sandwiches and appetizers are the main choices,on the menu.  I've tried enough to say that the meals are consistently average; the service is consistently dependable and pleasant.  There is a nice outside eating area.  On a 'good weather' day, take advantage of sitting outside.

name: Craig Wilson
text: The kids will enjoy watching the pizzas being made.  The adults will enjoy the selection of unique pizza combos.  The run of the mill cheese or pep. Pizzas are fine but not amazing

text: Love the pizza crust and the one of a kind toppings.  Tends to get crowded but never had to wait over 20 minutes put so.  Service various from acceptable to excellent.  Whether you like plain pepperoni or the Funky Q chicken, it is an excellent pizza and not a bad deal for the money if you share.
